property.name: text
property.value: This model launches a web server and provides a service available at http://localhost:8078/errorhandler. Run the model and navigate to that location (or double click on this comment).

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Dai Bui, Elizabeth Latronico, and Edward A. Lee

property.name: text
property.value: Type given for postRequest to aid type inference.

property.name: text
property.value: This model shows how to build a modal web service. In this case, the service switches modes when an error occurs running in the normal mode. Note that it will switch modes for all users. There is no notion of sessions here.

property.name: text
property.value: WebServer.preferredPort blank for dynamic port selection Find deployed port number for header comment link Force evaluation on model start

property.name: message
property.value: You were told not to enter "error".
